channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Cheap fall getaways
item.description: Here are 20 places to enjoy autumn colors without going into the red.

item.title: Cheap summer getaways in Michigan
item.description: On the Upper Peninsula and Lake Michigan shores, vacation for as little as $100.

item.title: Cheap summer getaways in Minnesota
item.description: No money, no problem: Here are 20 great vacations that are easy on the wallet.

item.title: Cheap summer getaways in Wisconsin
item.description: No money, no problem: Here are 20 great vacations that are easy on the wallet.

item.title: Michigan's Pictured Rocks
item.description: There's a lot of scenery crammed into one stretch of Lake Superior in Michigan's Upper Peninsula.

item.title: Afoot in the Porkies
item.description: On the Upper Peninsula, a splendid wilderness remains unchanged in the Porkies.

item.title: White gold in the Porkies
item.description: In Michigan's Upper Peninsula, a wilderness park rewards those who love snow.

item.title: Michigan's great lake cabins
item.description: In the only state that borders three Great Lakes, the best places to stay are in state parks.

item.title: A yen for yurts
item.description: Round canvas huts have come to the Midwest from Mongolia, with love.

item.title: A feast of festivals
item.description: Here's an eater's guide to small-town fests, from strawberries to sauerkraut and kolacky to sweet corn.

item.title: Circling Lake Michigan
item.description: On a drive around this inland sea, you'll find vineyards, lighthouses, a famous island and fabulous beaches.

item.title: Duluth 101
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about visiting this lively port town on Lake Superior.
